talk.author: did:plc:b2jtzj6phwbi6dqnr7ttvuxl
talk.utter: Which is rich since the opponent is a professional bamboozler who bamboozled voters into thinking that character doesn't matter in a President. Giving absolute power to a psychopath rarely works out well.

talk.author: did:plc:3degpewafhzuac7cmjaoigck
talk.utter: It's not that simple. People felt that they really didn't have a choice, so they either didn't vote or protested by voting for the circus clown. It's a system issue, where millions are left unrepresented (left; workers).

talk.author: did:plc:b2jtzj6phwbi6dqnr7ttvuxl
talk.utter: They had a choice:  vote for the pretty lady who wasn't an orange psychopath and doesn't want to be a dictator.  If they felt they "had no choice" then they were woeful misinformed and misguided. It is that simple.

talk.author: did:plc:b2jtzj6phwbi6dqnr7ttvuxl
talk.utter: They had a choice:  vote for the pretty lady who wasn't an orange psychopath and doesn't want to be a dictator.  If they felt they "had no choice" then they were woeful misinformed and misguided. It is that simple.

talk.author: did:plc:3degpewafhzuac7cmjaoigck
talk.utter: The Dems are nothing more than controlled opposition to keep the hordes in their place and money in the pockets of corporate/financial elites. Either you're too fucking stupid to see that or you're just comfortable with that arrangement. Either way, I'm done wasting my time on you.

talk.author: did:plc:b2jtzj6phwbi6dqnr7ttvuxl
talk.utter: That's exactly what I'm talking about.  Anyone who thinks that is woefully misinformed and misguided.

talk.author: did:plc:b2jtzj6phwbi6dqnr7ttvuxl
talk.utter: They had a choice:  vote for the pretty lady who wasn't an orange psychopath and doesn't want to be a dictator.  If they felt they "had no choice" then they were woeful misinformed and misguided. It is that simple.

talk.author: did:plc:3degpewafhzuac7cmjaoigck
talk.utter: I mean, really? You have the "choice" between two fucking corporate parties, and you think this is desirable? Perhaps if you're already of that class. How many times are people going to choose "the lesser evil" until they realized they're being fucked? Until you can't recognize evil anymore?

talk.author: did:plc:b2jtzj6phwbi6dqnr7ttvuxl
talk.utter: First of all, allowing the greater of two evils allows more evil.  Besides, there was nothing evil about Kamala, and nothing good about Trump.  Anyone who stayed home or voted for Trump is a blithering idiot.

talk.author: did:plc:b2jtzj6phwbi6dqnr7ttvuxl
